name: American Conquest: Anthology
summary: American Conquest: Anthology is a PC collection developed by GSC Game World in 2008 and distributed in Italy and Spain by FX Interactive. The FX edition includes the original game and the Fight Back expansion. The game features five stories (the Discovery, Pre-Columbian Civilizations, European Powers, the Conquest of the West, and the War of Independence), and numerous historical figures such as Christopher Columbus, Cortès, Montezuma, George Washington, and many others.
